item.title: ⏳📦 Time & Space Complexity Explained with Pokémon! 🎮🐉
item.description:
⏳📦 Time & Space Complexity Explained with Pokémon! 🎮🐉

When writing code, we often want to know how fast it runs ⏩ and how much memory it uses 💾. This is where time complexity and space complexity come in! Let’s break these down using Pokémon-themed examples, so you can catch ’em all 🎯—both in battle and in algorithm mastery! 🔥

⚡ Big O Notation - The Trainer’s Guide 📖

Big O notation helps us understand how an algorithm scales as the input size grows. Think of it as training a Pokémon: some level up quickly ⚡, while others take forever ⏳!
